entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dunchurch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:13 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
